page.title: 14A Day in the Life of.....(4)
page.content: .....MOTHER (Continued) We arrived home just in time for me to help load the car for another delivery. It was now time to relax,welcome the eldest two boys home from school,and we all reflected on the day we'd all had. Now it was time to prepare tea and keep the peace between the various antagonists.After tea the boys helped by cleaning up and washing up whilst I read stories to the younger boys.By 8p. m the three youngest were in bed and by 10p.m. the two older boys as well.It was now time to have a cup of coffee with my husband who had just finished his day's work.We might watch something interesting on television or discuss any problems that may have surfaced during the day....And so to bed,before starting off on our daytime activities again.
